file_intent.text: Data loading and query processing for document retrieval

responsibilities.label: Load PageRank Scores
responsibilities.description: Loads pagerank scores from a file into a global dictionary

responsibilities.label: Load Inverted Index
responsibilities.description: Loads an inverted index from a file into global dictionaries

responsibilities.label: Load All Data
responsibilities.description: Loads all required data into memory by calling other load functions

responsibilities.label: Process Query
responsibilities.description: Processes a query and returns hits for documents matching the query
